section1.description: The 1st section is mainly dedicated to ethical questions regarding your AI project. In the politics field it has a great relevance for sure.

section2.description: The 2nd section includes questions regarding the composition of your AI working team. In the politics field it might have a low impact.

section3.description: The 3rd section provides questions on the project's data gathering phase. The dataset variety and its features are considered. In the politics field it has a medium impact.

section4.description: The 4th section mainly includes questions on the quality of the gathered data. The dataset sources, its cleaning and tags are evaluated. In the politics field it might have a strong impact.

section5.description: The 5th section makes questions on the dataset dimension w.r.t. the context of application. In the politics field it might have a low impact.

section6.description: The 6th section makes questions on the algorithmic phase, the evaluation of the output and the general Bias detection. In the politics field it might have a medium impact.
